page.title: 20Credits
page.content: {All the Children in Class 9 (aged 9) {At LITTLEPORT COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL { {BOYS}Karl Betts,Darren Coulson*,James Cross,Alex Davies,James Ewing,David Harrison,James Loosely*,Jamie Lyons*, Ashley Mack,Kevin Markham,Andrew Payne Craig Scott,Andrew Scoville,Ian Timbers,Gary Whitehand,Stuart Wicks {GIRLS}Zoie Butcher,Aloha Coulson,Emma Crothers,Elizabeth Dendy,Sarah Garner, Amanda Gooby,Clare Hill,Viki Hodges, Jennifer Wilson,Natalie Zamikula { }(*= special reports) {Headmaster}Mr Hurlin {Teacher}Mr Aylen { {Local History & Resources}Mr Jakes {Local Community Information}Mr Andrews {Interviews}Mr Rice,Mr Stacey,Mr Green, Mr Gathercole,Mr Jakes & Mr Andrews. { {THE BBC,ACORN COMPUTERS & Prof.T.Wragg
